html:
PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2023-03242023-04-05PMO
ActPublic Service Employment Act
SubjectOrder Establishing the Mandate of the Independent Special Rapporteur on Foreign Interference
PrecisOrder establishing the MANDATE of the INDEPENDENT SPECIAL RAPPORTEUR ON FOREIGN INTERFERENCE in order to outline the duties and manner in which the Independent Special Rapporteur on Foreign Interference will provide independent advice to the Prime Minister and make expert recommendations on how to further protect our democracy and uphold Canadians’ confidence.
AttachmentsAttachment
subject: Order Establishing the Mandate of the Independent Special Rapporteur on Foreign Interference
precis: Order establishing the MANDATE of the INDEPENDENT SPECIAL RAPPORTEUR ON FOREIGN INTERFERENCE in order to outline the duties and manner in which the Independent Special Rapporteur on Foreign Interference will provide independent advice to the Prime Minister and make expert recommendations on how to further protect our democracy and uphold Canadians’ confidence.
